attributes.action: allow the use of mobile phone jamming equipment in uk prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to aid violence reduction, prevent the escalation of drug smuggling / use and subsequent bullying and assaults which go hand in hand with this culture. To reduce potential for escapes, to reduce potential for prisoners to intimidate victims, to prevent peadephiles from contacting victims / forming networks. We know prisons are full of mobile phones, let us use the technology available. I petition for a TRIAL of such equipment.
